content:
Currently the invite users modal is too crowded.So to make it less crowded there is a plan to remove all the streams listed from there and just invite the new users to default streams of the realm by default. If the user wishes to add or remove some streams to which the new users would be invited, there will be an option for edit.
Any feedback regarding this?

https://chat.zulip.org/user_uploads/2/8f/HoFrjSzEr35oRLKgpcr6dEq-/Screenshot-from-2017-12-08-23-55-05.png
The plan is to do something like this. (only the stream part and not the emails part)
